name: Mandelbrot Explorer Fractal Region Settings File
summary: Learn about .FRR files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: FRR files are used to store the settings for a particular magnification level within a fractal image. They are saved using XML formatting, and can be viewed with any text editor.
NOTE: Mandelbrot Explorer 2.5 and earlier versions save fractal region settings files with the ".frr" extension. After version 2.5, the files use the .MXFR extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
